learning_objectives.objective_title: the factors that affect population growth
learning_objectives.guidance: Birth rate, death rate, net migration, immigration and emigration.

learning_objectives.objective_title: reasons for different rates of population growth in different countries
learning_objectives.guidance: How and why birth rates, death rates and net migration vary between countries.

learning_objectives.objective_title: the effects of changes in the size and structure of population on different countries
learning_objectives.guidance: The concept of an optimum population. The effects of increases and decreases in population size and changes in the age and gender distribution of population. Note: interpretation of a population pyramid is required, but drawing is not.
